statements: DELETE FROM LoanPerformance WHERE loan_id = 100 AND borrower_id = 200;
DELETE FROM LoanPerformance WHERE loan_id = 100 AND borrower_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE metric_name = 'Late Payment Penalty' AND metric_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM LoanPerformance WHERE loan_amount > 10000 AND loan_status = 'Approved';
DELETE FROM LoanPerformance WHERE loan_id = 101 AND loan_amount > 5000;
DELETE FROM LoanPayments WHERE payment_date < '2021-01-01' AND payment_amount = 0;
